topic.title: Installing the License Server All-Platform Distribution

ol.li: [Prerequisite] Java 11 or later must be installed.
Download the HTTP license server all-platform archive from the HTTP License Server website.

Run the license server scripts suitable for your operating system (licenseServer.bat for Windows or licenseServer.sh for Linux and macOS).To specify a port other than the default 8080, you can pass a new port number as an argument to the scripts (for example, licenseServer.bat 8082). You can also change the port by editing the vmoptions file located at oXygen HTTP License Server\Windows Service\oXygenHTTPLicenseServer.vmoptions.

On the first run, you are prompted to set two sets of credentials:
Administrator credentials - Used for accessing the Oxygen license server administrative interface.
Standard user credentials - Used by an Oxygen application to connect to the license server.

section.title: HTTPS Support
section.p: The All-Platform Distribution of the HTTP License Server do not provide the means to use HTTPS (TLS). If you need HTTPS, you should install the HTTP License Server WAR Distribution on Tomcat (preferably 9.x). See the WAR Distribution HTTPS Support section for more details.
